official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week beginning on June 19, 1983, as "A Rose for Friendship Week" and to provide for the designation of June 22, 1983, as "A Rose for Friendship Day".

summary.text: Designates the week beginning on June 19, 1983, as A Rose for Friendship Week and June 22, 1983, as A Rose for Friendship Day.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week beginning on June 19, 1983, as "A Rose for Friendship Week" and to provide for the designation of June 22, 1983, as "A Rose for Friendship Day".
